name: fq-compressor Dev
initializeCommand: bash -lc "H=\"${HOME:-}\"; if [ -z \"$H\" ] && command -v getent >/dev/null 2>&1; then H=\"$(getent passwd $(id -un) | cut -d: -f6)\"; fi; if [ -n \"$H\" ]; then if [ -d \"$H/.gitconfig\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: ~/.gitconfig 是目录，会导致 devcontainer bind mount 失败，请删除该目录并改为文件。' >&2; exit 1; fi; if [ ! -e \"$H/.gitconfig\" ]; then touch \"$H/.gitconfig\"; fi; cp -f \"$H/.gitconfig\" /tmp/fqcompressor-host-gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /tmp/fqcompressor-host-gitconfig ]; then touch /tmp/fqcompressor-host-gitconfig; fi; true"
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "cd /workspace || exit 0; if [ -z \"${WSL_DISTRO_NAME:-}\" ]; then echo 'WARNING: 建议使用 VS Code Remote - WSL 在 WSL2 中打开仓库，再执行 Reopen in Container（更稳定/更快/更一致）。' >&2; fi; if [ ! -S /ssh-agent ]; then echo 'WARNING: 未检测到 SSH agent 注入（/ssh-agent 不存在）。若需要访问私有仓库，请在 WSL 中执行：eval \"$(ssh-agent -s)\" && ssh-add，然后 Rebuild/Reopen。' >&2; fi; if [ -d /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then rm -rf /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then touch /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ -f /tmp/host-gitconfig ]; then cp -f /tmp/host-gitconfig /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! git config --global --get-all safe.directory 2>/dev/null | grep -Fxq /workspace; then git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; fi; fi; if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then git config commit.template .gitmessage.txt || true; else echo 'WARNING: /workspace 不是 Git 仓库，跳过 git config commit.template。' >&2; fi; conan profile detect --force >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; bash /workspace/.devcontainer/setup-sshd.sh || true; true"
postStartCommand: bash -lc "if [ -d /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then rm -rf /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then touch /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ -f /tmp/host-gitconfig ]; then cp -f /tmp/host-gitconfig /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! git config --global --get-all safe.directory 2>/dev/null | grep -Fxq /workspace; then git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; fi; fi; bash /workspace/.devcontainer/start-sshd.sh || true; true"
postAttachCommand: bash -lc "if [ -d /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then rm -rf /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then touch /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ -f /tmp/host-gitconfig ]; then cp -f /tmp/host-gitconfig /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! git config --global --get-all safe.directory 2>/dev/null | grep -Fxq /workspace; then git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; fi; fi; bash /workspace/.devcontainer/start-sshd.sh || true; true"
